enWisdom: Certitude is the cornerstone of religion
The cornerstone of religion is true certitude

Wisdom: نِظَامُ الْمُرُوءَةِ حُسْنُ الْأُخُوَّةِ وَنِظَامُ الدِّينِ حُسْنُ الْيَقِينِ
enWisdom: Death of a brother is like having wings clipped and hands cut
The steadfastness of religion is through the strength of conviction

Wisdom: سَنَامُ الدِّينِ الصَّبْرُ وَالْيَقِينُ وَمُجَاهَدَةُ الْهَوَى
enWisdom: The pinnacle of religion is patience, certitude and struggling against vain desires

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِلُزُومِ الْيَقِينِ وَتَجَنَّبِ الشَّكَّ فَلَيْسَ لِلْمَرْءِ شَيْ‏ءٌ أَهْلَكَ لِدِينِهِ مِنْ غَلَبَةِ الشَّكِّ عَلَى يَقِينِهِ
enWisdom: Cling to certitude and eschew doubt, for there is nothing more destructive for a person with regards to his religion than the prevailing of doubt over his certitude
Certitude is the symbol of faith
Certitude is the pillar of faith

Wisdom: قَوُّوا إِيمَانَكُمْ بِالْيَقِينِ فَإِنَّهُ أَفْضَلُ الدِّينِ
enWisdom: Strengthen your faith with certitude, for this is the best religion
The pinnacle of faith is certitude

Wisdom: لَا إِيمَانَ لِمَنْ لَا يَقِينَ لَهُ
enWisdom: He who has no certitude has no faith
